text:
Image zoom

From red carpets to off-duty street style, Stuart Weitzman is a celebrity favorite when it comes to chic shoes. Not only are the brand’s designs incredibly lust-worthy, but the luxurious fabrics and expertly crafted silhouettes make the label’s shoes as comfortable as they are timeless. Of course, as a celebrity favorite, the shoes also come with a high price tag, running anywhere from $298 to $2,500 and up. But luckily right now, you can score the hottest styles loved by celebrities such as, Kendall Jenner, Gigi Hadid, Ashley Graham, and more are on major sale.

We’re talking about 40 percent off of hundreds of styles, including Stuart Weitzman’s most iconic over-the-knee boots, “Nudist” sandals, trendy mules, sexy high heel sandals, and more. There’s no code needed since all sale prices are already listed, so just add your favorites to your shopping cart and checkout — it’s as easy as that. We’d recommend moving fast, particularly on Kendall’s mules — sizes are already selling out fast.

Kendall Jenner in The Lulah Mule

Image zoom Gotham/GC Images

Buy It! The Lulah Mule, $219 (orig. $365); stuartweitzman.com

Lupita Nyong’o in The Joni Sandal

Image zoom BlayzenPhotos / BACKGRID

Buy It! The Joni Sandal, $270 (orig. $450); stuartweitzman.com

Ashley Graham in The Mesha 95 Sandal

Image zoom Madison McGaw/BFA.com

Buy It! The Mesha 95 Sandal, $255 (orig. $425); stuartweitzman.com

Gigi Hadid in The Mira Mule

Image zoom Splash

Buy It! The Mira Mule, $273 (orig. $455); stuartweitzman.com

Kasey Musgraves in The Joni Sandal

Image zoom Raymond Hall/GC Images

Buy It! The Joni Sandal, $270 (orig. $450); stuartweitzman.com
title: You Can Get the Shoes Kendall Jenner, Gigi Hadid, and More Stars Love on Major Sale Right Now
